name: William Wingard
pob: Lexington, Lexington, South Carolina, United States
bio:
Father of Richard William (Dick) b 8/5/1822 m Mary Lou Miles-Oliver, a widow, who was descendant of a Creek Indian Princess—Big Woman—father of Efau Hadjo (Mad Dog).

Father of Tom b 1837 or 1838 who died in Civil War, buried in Solidier's Cemetary, Knoxville, TN. No children.
